channel.title: Customization on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Customization on Automaly

item.title: Extend the standard reports in Dynamics 365 finance and operations (CustAccountStatementExt)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete tutorial for extending standard Customer Account Statement reports in D365 Finance Operations using SSRS, COC extensions, and customization techniques.

item.title: Understand model store architectural in AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn about AX 2012 model store architecture, layers, and models that replaced AOD files from previous versions. Understand how the model store manages application elements and customizations in the database.
